Class RestEasyHttpRequestDecoder

java.lang.Object
io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter

io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageDecoder<io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest>
org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.server.netty.RestEasyHttpRequestDecoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler
@Sharable public class RestEasyHttpRequestDecoder extends io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageDecoder<io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest>
This MessageToMessageDecoder is responsible for decode HttpRequest to NettyHttpRequest's This implementation is ChannelHandler.Sharable
Author:
Norman Maurer
